Package com.backend.Services.Services

package com.backend.Services.Services
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BuyerFacade
    Buyer Facade that interacts with buyer controller,
    LocationService
    Service that manages the location related data
    OrderService
    Service that manages data related to the orders data type
    OrderXFoodService
    Order x Food signifies the relation between the food and the order that it is bound to This was chosen in order to have a list of foods bound to orders in the database and in the program logic
    PdfMaker
    A pdf maker helper class that creates a byte stream containing order information
    RestaurantFoodService
    Service that manipulates data regarding the food related information from the database
    RestaurantUserFacade
    Buyer Facade that interacts with restaurant admin controller,
    UserService
    The user service that manages data related to the user information
